file.name: circular-root.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Test
  version: 0.0.1
  description: |
    testing circular reference

components:
  schemas:
    A:
      $ref: './circular-child.yaml#/definitions/A'
    B:
      $ref: './circular-child.yaml#/definitions/B'

paths:
  '/test':
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: test
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  A:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/A'

Error: parse: paths: /test: get: : responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: A: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/A": parse schema: reference "./circular-child.yaml#/definitions/A": resolve reference "./circular-child.yaml#/definitions/A": invalid schema reference "./circular-child.yaml#/definitions/A"
